item.description:
A silent film w/live music!

 

La passion de Jeanne d’Arc(1928) Director: Carl Theodor Dreyer. Cast: Maria Falconetti, Eugène Silvain, Antonin Artaud.

April in Paris opens with the rare screening of the silent film masterpiece written and directed by Carol Theodor Dreyer. Comédie Française star Maria Falconetti plays the intensely spiritual teenager who led French troops to war - and herself to martyrdom. Pianist Patrick Miller of The Hartt School returns to the Festival to animate the silent screen with his unique musical talent! Refreshments will be provided by the Alliance Française of Hartford.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "The Passion of Joan of Arc"
